name: @scramjet/python-weather-args
description: Scramjet Cloud Platform Sequence Python to display weather data from open-meteo.com
author: Karol Tylenda

scripts.build:refapps:only: mkdir -p dist/__pypackages__/ && cp *.py dist/ && cp sample-startup-config.json dist/ && pip3 install -t dist/__pypackages__/ -r requirements.txt
